items.sentence: If it\'s not raining, Tom usually walks to school.
I\'m kind of sleepy so I\'ll be heading back soon.
Tom said that he hoped to be back by October 20th.
Tom said that the mistake was due to an oversight.
When I entered Tom\'s room, he was reading a book.
Why don\'t we just do it now and get it over with?
I didn\'t realize you couldn\'t understand French.
Tom doesn\'t know exactly what he should be doing.
Why aren\'t you wearing those earrings I gave you?
Why didn\'t you let me know you were in Australia?
